alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 3:34PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Henry, southeastern Washington and west central Louisa Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 334 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ainsworth, or near Washington, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ainsworth around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Noble and Marr Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
